scripts.pub1: npm run ver && cd libs/jsx6 && npm publish && cd ../dom-observer && npm publish
scripts.pub2: cd libs/jsx-runtime && npm publish && cd ../jsx-dev-runtime && npm publish && cd ../signal && npm publish
scripts.pub3: cd libs/signal-state && npm publish && cd ../signal-dom && npm publish && cd ../signal-clock && npm publish
scripts.publish: npm run pub1 && npm run pub2 && npm run pub3 && npm run pub4
